edge: The song Yaad Aati Hai is a part of the soundtrack album for the movie Yaadein.
Anu Malik composed the music for the movie Yaadein.
Subhash Ghai is the producer of the movie Yaadein.
Anu Malik also composed the music for the movie Aks (2001).
Sukhwinder Singh sang two songs in the soundtrack album of Yaadein.
Udit Narayan sang two songs in the soundtrack album of Yaadein.
AR Rahman was initially approached to compose for Aks (2001), but he declined due to prior commitments.
Sukhwinder Singh and Kavita Krishnamurthy sang the song Chanda Taare from the soundtrack album of Yaadein.
Alka Yagnik sang in two songs, Eli Re Eli and Chamakti Shaam Hai, from the soundtrack album of Yaadein.
Anu Malik also composed the music for the movie Lajja (2001).
